title: PC 7 March - The union activity equivalent to "criminal association": the Piacenza prosecutor tries again!
content:
AND Of these hours the news that the prosecutor of Piacenza, Matteo Centini has the closing of the preliminary investigations relating to the investigation game back in 2018, and which in August 2022 had led to house arrest against Aldo Milani, Mohamed Arafat, Carlo Pallavicini and Bruno Scagnelli del Si Cobas and similar measures against some USB unionists, on charges, among other things, of Association for criminal: this suggests that, with each probability, there will be the indictment.

Recall that in the summer of two years ago, at the same time as the imposing mobilizations of workers Si Cobas, the freedom court of Bologna decided to revoke any restrictive measure against companions, considering The accusation of criminal association is completely unfounded, built artfully to the sole purpose of stopping conflicting unionism in one cities such as Piacenza and in the sector like that of logistics in which The vast majority of workers turned their backs on CGIL-CISL-UIL state unionism, to join the SI Cobas or ad Other acronyms of basic unionism.
It must also be remembered that Against the provision of the judges of Bologna, the Public Prosecutor of Piacenza has appealed four times, and in all cases such appeals they were rejected!
Therefore, although the all -political character of This theorem has been widely unmasked, this has not slowed down the Prosecutor of Piacenza from pursuing his purpose of criminalizing the Yes Cobas and his managers, for the mere fact of organizing strikes in defense of workers and not having folded the head to masters.
